sentences.en: A lot of this has to do with power and greed.
sentences.cn: 凡此种种都和权力与贪欲有关。

sentences.en: As long as the operative word is "greed", you can't count on people keeping the costs down.
sentences.cn: 只要“贪婪”仍是一切的出发点，就别指望人们会降低成本。

sentences.en: Greed is one of the seven deadly sins .
Greed was his only motive for stealing.
sentences.cn: 贪婪是他盗窃的唯一动机.

sentences.en: He raised his head, with a look of unrestrained greed in his covetous eyes.
sentences.cn: 他抬起头来, 一对贪婪的眼光露出馋涎欲滴的神情.

sentences.en: His actions were motivated by greed.
sentences.cn: 他的作为是贪婪之心所驱使的。

sentences.en: His greed for power knows no bounds.
sentences.cn: 他的权力欲是无止境的.

sentences.en: His suicide is the latest chapter in this terrible saga of greed and betrayal.
sentences.cn: 他的自杀是这部充满贪婪与背叛的可怕长篇故事的最新一章.

sentences.en: I get fed up with other people's greed.
sentences.cn: 我对别人的贪婪厌烦透了。

sentences.en: Nothing could sate the careerist's greed for power.
sentences.cn: 什么也满足不了这个野心家的权力欲。

sentences.en: people motivated by jealousy and greed
sentences.cn: 受妒忌和贪婪驱使的人们

sentences.en: The miser was an incarnation of greed.
sentences.cn: 那个守财奴是贪婪的化身.

sentences.en: The rawness of his greed was frank and uninhibited.
sentences.cn: 他的贪婪是赤裸裸的，干脆直接，毫不掩饰。

sentences.en: The word " food " may connote " greed ".
sentences.cn: “ food ” 这个词可以含有 “ 贪婪 ” 的意思.

sentences.en: There is evidence that the industry's greed means that it is cutting off its nose to spite its face.
sentences.cn: 有证据表明该产业的贪婪是在作茧自缚。

trans.tran_en: a strong desire for more food, money, power, possessions etc than you need
